title: Blake Lively, Salma Hayek hilariously troll Ryan Reynolds on his birthday
text:
CLOSE Ryan Reynolds may voice "Pikachu," but all eyes were on Blake Lively and her baby bump at the movie's premiere. USA TODAY

Ryan Reynolds just got out-trolled on his own birthday.

Salma Hayek celebrated the actor's 42nd birthday Wednesday with a less than flattering photo of her "Hitman's Bodyguard" co-star, while she looked, well, perfect.

"Yes, Ryan, I am using your birthday to post this picture where I don’t look so bad, while you look all beat up," she captioned an Instagram photo of herself holding a bottle of Aviation American Gin next to an unprepared Reynolds.

Hayek, 53, also took the opportunity to steal the spotlight by reminding Reynolds of an unfulfilled promise he made to her on her birthday on Sept. 2.

Cheers: Ryan Reynolds hilariously trolls his gin company in Amazon review

"You were gonna send me some Aviation gin for MY birthday AND THAT WAS ALMOST TWO MONTHS AGO," she said, referring to the American spirit company Reynolds bought in 2018.

More:Ryan Reynolds' NSFW response to Kate Beckinsale, who believes they 'look exactly' alike

She added, "Oh and Happy Birthday by the way."

The birthday trolling didn't stop there.

An Instagram Story posted by Salma Hayek of her "Hitman's Bodyguard" co-stars Samuel L. Jackson and a partial Ryan Reynolds. (Photo: Salma Hayek's Instagram Story)

Hayek took a page out of Reynolds' cropping playbook and nearly cropped his face out of several pictures of herself, Reynolds and fellow "Hitman's Bodyguard" co-star Samuel L. Jackson on her Instagram Story.

"Happy Birthday to one of my dear friends Ryan Reynolds. Love sharing the screen with you," she captioned the series of hilariously trimmed pictures.

Reynolds pulled a similar move in August 2017 while wishing wife Blake Lively a happy birthday. His wife returned the favor Wednesday.

"I picked a good one. Happy birthday @vancityreynolds," Lively captioned a playful picture of her literally picking Reynolds' nose.

Now we are just waiting on Reynolds, the master-troller himself, to enact revenge on Hayek and Lively.

description: Checkmate! Ryan Reynolds just got out-trolled on his own birthday by wife Blake Lively and his "Hitman's Bodyguard" co-star Salma Hayek.
